Palatine Anthology. Complexity for a digital research project

Margot Lise Mellet (margot.mellet@umontreal.ca), Canada Research Chair in digital textualities, Canada and Marcello Vitali-Rosati (marcello.vitali.rosati@umontreal.ca), Canada Research Chair in digital textualities, Canada and Elsa Bouchard (elsa.bouchard@umontreal.ca), CRIHN : Centre de Recherche Interuniversitaire sur les Humanités Numériques and Servanne Monjour (servanne.monjour@umontreal.ca), McGill University and Enrico Agostini-Marchese (enrico.agostini88@gmail.com), Canada Research Chair in digital textualities, Canada and Beth Kearney (bessykearney@me.com), University of Montreal

Vitali Rosati, Marcello. 2018. On Editorialization: Structuring Space and Authority in the Digital Age . Institute of Network Cultures. Amsterdam.
